医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
引入生物制剂后，炎症性肠病的治疗发生了怎样的变化？研究人员比较了日本引入生物制剂前后炎症性肠病治疗策略的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/How-have-itis-bowel-disease-treatments-changed-after-the-introduction-of-biologics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/How-have-itis-bowel-disease-treatments-changed-after-the-introduction-of-biologics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e31adc1-58c1-49f7-853e-437dd09430b9 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 10:08:00 -0400 How have inflammatory bowel disease treatments changed after the introduction of biologics?
脂肪酸组合补充剂可改善早产儿的视觉功能补充 omega-3 和 omega-6 脂肪酸组合的早产儿到两岁半时视觉功能会更好。哥德堡大学的一项研究表明了这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Fatty-acid-combination-supplement-improves-visual-function-in-preterm-babies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Fatty-acid-combination-supplement-improves-visual-function-in-preterm-babies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5fe34c3-783f-474f-9f74-f63195c3988b Thu, 24 Aug 2023 10:03:14 -0400 Fatty acid combination supplement improves visual function in preterm babies
用于治疗自身炎症性疾病的 NLRP3 炎症小体小分子抑制剂研究人员描述了 JT002 的临床前概况，JT002 是一种新型口服生物可利用的 NLRP3 炎症小分子抑制剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Small-molecule-inhibitor-of-the-NLRP3-inflammasome-for-treating-autolingual-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Small-molecule-inhibitor-of-the-NLRP3-inflammasome-for-treating-autolingual-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd51117e-6ba9-413a-8846-55cd99834011 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 10:02:00 -0400 Small molecule inhibitor of the NLRP3 inflammasome for treating autoinflammatory diseases
新方法利用机器学习快速轻松地诊断风湿病研究人员评估了荧光光学成像作为一种准确、快速诊断手部风湿性疾病的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Novel-approach-uses-machine-learning-for-quick-and-easy-rheumatic-disease-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Novel-approach-uses-machine-learning-for-quick-and-easy-rheumatic-disease-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4925c851-8b44-4f1c-a685-be2c8e925ed8 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 09:39:00 -0400 Novel approach uses machine learning for quick and easy rheumatic disease diagnosis
看护者的教育水平和儿童年龄会影响 COVID-19 期间的压力水平研究人员在 NIH 儿童健康结果环境影响 (ECHO) 项目最近的一项研究中发现，在 COVID-19 大流行期间，看护者的教育水平和孩子的年龄在决定他们的主要压力来源方面发挥了重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Caregiver-education-level-and-child-age-affect-stress-levels-during-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Caregiver-education-level-and-child-age-affect-stress-levels-during-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6db1bef2-19b6-4ad1-871c-9ec554a3bd64 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 09:16:15 -0400 Caregiver education level and child age affect stress levels during COVID-19
沃特世公司和普林斯顿大学宣布多年研究合作沃特世公司宣布与普林斯顿大学开展多年研究合作，使科学家、教师和学生能够共同努力，利用他们不同的技能和背景来解决生物化学和材料科学领域的复杂挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Waters-Corporation-and-Princeton-University-announce-multi-year-research-collaboration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Waters-Corporation-and-Princeton-University-announce-multi-year-research-collaboration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a43c01ba-37a0-4cc3-9d6d-c61581beb5da Thu, 24 Aug 2023 09:01:00 -0400 Waters Corporation and Princeton University announce multi-year research collaboration

土壤矿物质含量会影响人类生长和营养吗？研究人员研究了印度儿童和成年女性的土壤矿物质含量与健康状况之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Is-soil-mineral-content-impacting- human-growth-and-nutrition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Is-soil-mineral-content-impacting- human-growth-and-nutrition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67b4ccf4-6ae6-4646-beda-8c356859ab79 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 08:13:00 -0400 Is soil mineral content impacting human growth and nutrition?
男性和女性 COVID-19 患者对 IL-6 抑制治疗的免疫反应差异研究人员调查了抗白细胞介素 6 单克隆抗体是否与男性和女性 COVID-19 患者之间的异质治疗效果相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Differences-in-immune-responses-to-IL-6-inhibition-therapy- Between-male-and-female-COVID-19-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Differences-in-immune-responses-to-IL-6-inhibition-therapy- Between-male-and-female-COVID-19-病人.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=742f5bf2-d71b-4e74-bd29-6cf751c1ec45 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 08:05:00 -0400 Differences in immune responses to IL-6 inhibition therapy between male and female COVID-19 patients
用于预测阿尔茨海默病进展的最新神经影像程序和机器学习方法研究人员检查了最近的研究，探索先进机器学习 (ML) 算法辅助的神经影像模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/The-most-recent-neuroimaging-procedures-and-machine-learning-approaches-for-the-prediction-of-Alzheimere28099s-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/The-most-recent-neuroimaging-procedures-and-machine-learning-approaches-for-the-prediction-of-Alzheimere28099s-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c63d453-8f8a-4c73-8ad8-5e4490ebb68e Thu, 24 Aug 2023 08:01:00 -0400 The most recent neuroimaging procedures and machine learning approaches for the prediction of Alzheimer’s progression
